metadata.text1:
Position the airway & suction
If sats < 90% put on oxygen
If distress is significant & > 1kg consider CPAP according to the TRY CPAP algorithm.
Consult local guidelines for how to give CPAP
metadata.text2:
- If breathing 60-80 bpm use cup/NGT
- If needing CPAP use OGT
- If breathing > 80 bpm consider IV fluids
metadata.text3: Antibiotics are recommended in all prems with RDS
metadata.title3: 3. Get IV access and start antibiotics
